author: jsdelfino
msg: I had added the whole C++ stack trace to Python exceptions, this makes them too verbose and confusing, changed to do the same as in the other scripting languages, now only reporting the exception class name and text, but this is still more than before as initially they didn't contain any info from the original exception.
